official_title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), That the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Monday August 12, 1974, at 9 p.m. for the purpose of receiving such communications as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

summary.text: Provides for a joint session of the two Houses on Monday, August 12, 1974 to receive a message from the President of the United States.

titles.title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), That the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Monday August 12, 1974, at 9 p.m. for the purpose of receiving such communications as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.
